patthana21.16:1.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.16:2.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.

patthana21.16:3.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.

patthana21.16:4.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:6.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:8.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:10.1.pli: Nasavitakkaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:12.1.pli: Nasavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:14.1.pli: Nasappītikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sappītiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:16.1.pli: Napītisahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:18.1.pli: Nasukhasahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sukhasahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:20.1.pli: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upekkhāsahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:22.1.pli: Nanakāmāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanakāmāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kāmāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:24.1.pli: Narūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā rūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Narūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā narūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:26.1.pli: Naarūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā arūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naarūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naarūpāvacaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:28.1.pli: Naapariyāpannaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā apariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naapariyāpannaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā pariyāpanno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:30.1.pli: Naniyyānikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naniyyānikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaniyyāniko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:32.1.pli: Naniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā niyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā aniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:34.1.pli: Naanuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sauttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.16:36.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā araṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.16:37.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.16:38.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.

patthana21.17:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nahetu sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.17:2.1.pli: Nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Vipākaṃ natthi.)

patthana21.17:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.18:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.18:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā hetu vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.18:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.19:1.1.pli: Nahetu naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo hetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nahetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo hetussa upādinnupādāniyassa ca nahetussa upādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana21.19:2.1.pli: Nanahetu naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nahetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana21.19:3.1.pli: Nahetu naupādinnupādāniyo ca nanahetu naupādinnupādāniyo ca dhammā hetussa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Nava pañhā.) Ārammaṇe anantare samanantare uppanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, āhāre ekaṃ, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā vigate nava, avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.19:4.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.19:5.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.2:1.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.2:2.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.2:3.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukaṃ naabyākatañca naahetukaṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.2:4.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.2:5.1.pli: Nahetusampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā …pe… hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.2:6.1.pli: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa kusalassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa kusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana21.2:7.1.pli: Naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana21.2:8.1.pli: Nahetu ceva naahetuko nakusalo ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava pañhā.)

patthana21.2:10.1.pli: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Nava pañhā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.

patthana21.2:11.1.pli: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Nava pañhā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, natthiyā vigate nava.

patthana21.20:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.20:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.20:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.21:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasavitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.21:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naavitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.21:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naavitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.22:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.22:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.22:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.23:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.23:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.23:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dukamūlaṃ ekaṃ saṅkhittaṃ, sabbattha tīṇi.)

patthana21.23:4.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.24:1.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.24:2.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.24:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dukamūlaṃ ekaṃ saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.24:4.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.25:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu ācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.25:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naapacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu apacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.25:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.26:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.26:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.26:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.27:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.27:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ namahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.27:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naappamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.28:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.28:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ namahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.28:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naappamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.29:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nahīnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.29:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ namajjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.29:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ napaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.3:1.1.pli: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Nava pañhā kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.

patthana21.3:2.1.pli: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca naakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Nava pañhā kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.

patthana21.3:3.1.pli: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca naabyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Nava pañhā kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, natthiyā vigate nava.

patthana21.30:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.30:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.30:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.31:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ namaggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.31:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ namaggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.31:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ namaggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.32:1.1.pli: Nahetu nauppanno dhammo hetussa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.33:1.1.pli: Nahetu napaccuppanno dhammo hetussa paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.33:2.1.pli: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, upanissaye nava, natthiyā vigate nava.

patthana21.34:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naatītārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.34:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naanāgatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.34:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ napaccuppannārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.35:1.1.pli: Nahetu naajjhatto dhammo hetussa ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava, purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.35:2.1.pli: Nahetu nabahiddhā dhammo hetussa bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava, purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.36:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.36:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā hetu bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.37:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana21.37:2.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.37:3.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.37:5.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana21.37:6.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.38:1.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana21.38:2.1.pli: Naahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.38:3.1.pli: (Nasahetukanaanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.38:4.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.38:5.1.pli: (Nahetusampayuttaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ sahetukadukasadisaṃ. Tīṇi pañhā. Hetusahetukaduke ca hetuhetusampayuttaduke ca pañhā no labbhati.)

patthana21.39:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ.

patthana21.39:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.39:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.39:4.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.4:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.4:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.4:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.40:1.1.pli: Naappaccayaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.40:2.1.pli: Naappaccayaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.40:3.1.pli: (Naappaccayanaanidassanaappaṭighamūlepi ekameva.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.41:1.1.pli: Nasanidassanaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.41:2.1.pli: Nasanidassanaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.41:3.1.pli: Nasanidassanaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.42:1.1.pli: Nasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana21.42:2.1.pli: Naappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana21.42:3.1.pli: Nasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Sabbattha tīṇi.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.42:4.1.pli: Nasappaṭighaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.42:5.1.pli: Naappaṭighaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.43:1.1.pli: Narūpiṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.43:2.1.pli: Narūpiṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.43:3.1.pli: Naarūpiṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.44:1.1.pli: Nalokiyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana21.44:2.1.pli: Nalokuttaraṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana21.44:3.1.pli: (Gaṇitakena gaṇetabbā tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.44:4.1.pli: Nalokiyaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanasappaṭigho …. (Tīṇiyeva pañhā kātabbā. Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.44:5.1.pli: Nalokuttaraṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.

patthana21.45:1.1.pli: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana21.45:2.1.pli: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.

patthana21.45:3.1.pli: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana21.45:4.1.pli: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighassa purimasadisaṃ navapañhaṃ kātabbaṃ. Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighamūlassa nava pañhāyeva.

patthana21.45:5.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.

patthana21.46:1.1.pli: Naāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana21.46:2.1.pli: Nanoāsavaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.46:3.1.pli: Noāsavaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana21.46:4.1.pli: Noāsavaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
